mapper.insert: insert into pre_binding(bind_id, uid, code_id, block_flag, create_time) values(#{bindId}, #{uid}, #{codeId}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})
mapper.select: SELECT pre_binding.bind_id, pre_binding.uid, pre_binding.code_id, pre_binding.block_flag, pre_binding.create_time FROM pre_binding, qrcode WHERE pre_binding.code_id = qrcode.code_value AND qrcode.code_occupied = 0 AND qrcode.code_delivered = 0 AND pre_binding.code_id = #{qrcode}
mapper.update: update airdevice.idle_machine set block_flag = 0 where uid = (select uid from airdevice.pre_binding where code_id = #{codeId});
